question: Which racing driver won the Formula One Hungarian Grand Prix?
explanation:
Formula One champion Lewis Hamilton has won the Hungarian Grand Prix held at Budapest, Hungary. 
British Driver Lewis Hamilton has clinched his 86th Grand Prix tournament. He is just five victories behind the legendary driver Michael Schumacher, who had won 91 races.  Lewis Hamilton won this tournament for the eighth time and equalled Michael Schumacherâ€™s single-venue record.
